Category.Name: Root
Category.Description: Provides the Root of the GenICam features tree.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.Description: Contains the features related to image acquisition, including the triggering mode.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.

Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.Description: Category for device information and control.

Category.Name: ActionControl
Category.Description: The Action chapter describes all features related to Action Signals in the device.

Category.Name: ActionScheduler
Category.Description: Allows scheduling action commands through GenICam instead of sending broadcast messages. Additionally, actions can be scheduled to be repeated infinitely at a configurable interval.

Category.Name: FileAccessControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the File Access control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the File Access control features.

Category.Name: MultiFrameSetOutputMode
Category.Description: Enables the sensor to output a sequence of 2 or 4 frames with configurable exposure times and gain values.

Category.Name: AutoFunctionsROI
Category.Description: Allows limiting the region of interest for auto functions (Auto Exposure, Auto Gain, Auto White Balance).

Category.Name: LUTControl
Category.Description: Contains the features related to the look-up table (LUT) control.

Category.Name: ChunkDataControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the Chunk Data control features.

Category.Name: EventControl
Category.ToolTip: Contains parameters for configuring event generation on the camera.
Category.Description: Contains parameters for configuring event generation on the camera.

Category.Name: EventExposureEndData
Category.ToolTip: Contains parameters for configuring Exposure End events.
Category.Description: Contains parameters for configuring Exposure End events.

Category.Name: EventFrameTriggerMissedData
Category.ToolTip: Contains parameters for configuring Frame Trigger Missed events.
Category.Description: Contains parameters for configuring Frame Trigger Missed events.

Category.Name: EventLine1RisingEdgeData
Category.ToolTip: Contains parameters for configuring Line1 Rising Edge events.
Category.Description: Contains parameters for configuring Line1 Rising Edge events.

Category.Name: EventLine1FallingEdgeData
Category.ToolTip: Contains parameters for configuring Line1 Falling Edge events.
Category.Description: Contains parameters for configuring Line1 Falling Edge events.

Category.Name: EventFocusMoveCompletedData
Category.ToolTip: Contains parameters for configuring Focus Move Completed events.
Category.Description: Contains parameters for configuring Focus Move Completed events.

Category.Name: EventZoomMoveCompletedData
Category.ToolTip: Contains parameters for configuring Zoom Move Completed events.
Category.Description: Contains parameters for configuring Zoom Move Completed events.

Category.Name: EventTestData
Category.ToolTip: Contains parameters for configuring test events.
Category.Description: Contains parameters for configuring test events.

Category.Name: TestControl
Category.Description: Contains parameters for testing.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the User Set control features.

Category.Name: PtpControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the features related to the Precision Time Protocol (PTP) of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMajor
Integer.Description: Major version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMinor
Integer.Description: Minor version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionSubMinor
Integer.Description: Sub minor version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML

Integer.Name: DeviceTLVersionSubMinor
Integer.Description: Sub minor version of the Transport Layer of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkSelector
Integer.Description: Selects which Link of the device to control.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelCount
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of streaming channels supported by the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelSelector
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelLink
Integer.Description: Index of device`s Link to use for streaming the specifed stream channel.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelPacketSize
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit
Integer.ToolTip: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link.
Integer.Description: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link. If necessary, delays will be uniformly inserted between transport layer packets in order to control the peak bandwidth.

Integer.Name: ActionDeviceKey
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands.
Integer.Description: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands. The device internal assertion of an action signal is only authorized if the ActionDeviceKey and the action device key value in the protocol message are equal.

Integer.Name: ActionSelector
Integer.Description: Selects to which Action Signal further Action settings apply.

Integer.Name: ActionGroupKey
Integer.Description: Provides the key that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.

Integer.Name: ActionGroupMask
Integer.Description: Provides the mask that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.

Integer.Name: ActionQueueSize
Integer.Description: Indicates the size of the scheduled action commands queue. This number represents the maximum number of scheduled action commands that can be pending at a given point in time.

Integer.Name: ActionSchedulerTime
Integer.ToolTip: Camera time for when the action is to be scheduled
Integer.Description: Camera time for when the action is to be scheduled.

Integer.Name: ActionSchedulerInterval
Integer.ToolTip: Action repetition interval. A value of 0 schedules the action to be executed only once
Integer.Description: Action repetition interval. A value of 0 schedules the action to be executed only once.

Integer.Name: VCDActionSchedulerInterval
Integer.Description: Action repetition interval. A value of 0 schedules the action to be executed only once.

Integer.Name: TimestampLatchValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched value of the timestamp counter
Integer.Description: Returns the latched value of the timestamp counter. The timestamp must first be latched by using the Timestamp Control Latch command.

Integer.Name: BinningHorizontal
Integer.Description: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This increases the intensity (or signal to noise ratio) of the pixels and reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image. A value of 1 indicates that no horizontal binning is performed by the camera.

Integer.Name: BinningVertical
Integer.Description: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This increases the intensity (or signal to noise ratio) of the pixels and reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image. A value of 1 indicates that no vertical binning is performed by the camera.

Integer.Name: DecimationHorizontal
Integer.Description: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image by the specified horizontal decimation factor.

Integer.Name: DecimationVertical
Integer.Description: Vertical sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image by the specified vertical decimation factor.

Integer.Name: Brightness
Integer.ToolTip: Brightness

Integer.Name: GainRawHidden
Integer.ToolTip: Gain

Integer.Name: ExposureAutoReference
Integer.ToolTip: ExposureAuto/GainAuto target brightness
Integer.Description: Configures the target image brightness for the ExposureAuto/GainAuto algorithm.

Integer.Name: AutoFunctionsROILeft
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset of the auto functions region of interest
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset of the auto functions region of interest.

Integer.Name: AutoFunctionsROITop
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset of the auto functions region of interest
Integer.Description: Vertical offset of the auto functions region of interest.

Integer.Name: AutoFunctionsROIWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal size of the auto functions region of interest
Integer.Description: Horizontal size of the auto functions region of interest.

Integer.Name: AutoFunctionsROIHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical size of the auto functions region of interest
Integer.Description: Vertical size of the auto functions region of interest.

Integer.Name: LUTIndex
Integer.Description: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the LUT.

Integer.Name: LUTValue
Integer.Description: Returns or sets the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionBurstFrameCount
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire for each trigger.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionBurstInterval
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum interval between frames in an acquisition burst.
Integer.Description: Minimum interval between frames in an acquisition burst.

Integer.Name: GPIO
Integer.ToolTip: General-purpose input/output value (combined)
Integer.Description: General-purpose input/output value (combined)

Integer.Name: GPIn
Integer.ToolTip: Status of the digital input pin
Integer.Description: Status of the digital input pin.

Integer.Name: GPOut
Integer.ToolTip: Status of the digital output pin
Integer.Description: Status of the digital output pin.

Integer.Name: StrobeMode
Integer.ToolTip: Strobe Mode

Integer.Name: StrobeDuration
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the fixed-duration pulse length.
Integer.Description: If StrobeOperation is FixedDuration, specifies the pulse length.

Integer.Name: StrobeDelay
Integer.ToolTip: The delay from start of exposure to the generated strobe pulse
Integer.Description: Configures the delay from start of exposure to the generated strobe pulse.

Integer.Name: EventExposureEnd
Integer.ToolTip: Unique identifier of the Exposure End event.
Integer.Description: Unique identifier of the Exposure End event. Use this parameter to get notified when the event occurs.

Integer.Name: EventExposureEndTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Timestamp of the Exposure End event.
Integer.Description: Timestamp of the Exposure End event.

Integer.Name: EventExposureEndFrameID
Integer.ToolTip: Frame ID of the Exposure End event.
Integer.Description: Frame ID of the Exposure End event.

Integer.Name: EventFrameTriggerMissed
Integer.ToolTip: Unique identifier of the Frame Trigger Missed event.
Integer.Description: Unique identifier of the Frame Trigger Missed event. Use this parameter to get notified when the event occurs.

Integer.Name: EventFrameTriggerMissedTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Timestamp of the Frame Trigger Missed event.
Integer.Description: Timestamp of the Frame Trigger Missed event.

Integer.Name: EventLine1RisingEdge
Integer.ToolTip: Unique identifier of the Line1 Rising Edge event.
Integer.Description: Unique identifier of the Line1 Rising Edge event. Use this parameter to get notified when the event occurs.

Integer.Name: EventLine1RisingEdgeTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Timestamp of the Line1 Rising Edge event.
Integer.Description: Timestamp of the Line1 Rising Edge event.

Integer.Name: EventLine1FallingEdge
Integer.ToolTip: Unique identifier of the Line1 Falling Edge event.
Integer.Description: Unique identifier of the Line1 Falling Edge event. Use this parameter to get notified when the event occurs.

Integer.Name: EventLine1FallingEdgeTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Timestamp of the Line1 Falling Edge event.
Integer.Description: Timestamp of the Line1 Falling Edge event.

Integer.Name: EventFocusMoveCompleted
Integer.ToolTip: Unique identifier of the Focus Move Completed event.
Integer.Description: Unique identifier of the Focus Move Completed event. Use this parameter to get notified when the event occurs.

Integer.Name: EventFocusMoveCompletedTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Timestamp of the Focus Move Completed event.
Integer.Description: Timestamp of the Focus Move Completed event.

Integer.Name: EventFocusMoveCompletedFocus
Integer.ToolTip: Focus value of the Focus Move Completed event.
Integer.Description: Focus value of the Focus Move Completed event.

Integer.Name: EventZoomMoveCompleted
Integer.ToolTip: Unique identifier of the Zoom Move Completed event.
Integer.Description: Unique identifier of the Zoom Move Completed event. Use this parameter to get notified when the event occurs.

Integer.Name: EventZoomMoveCompletedTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Timestamp of the Zoom Move Completed event.
Integer.Description: Timestamp of the Zoom Move Completed event.

Integer.Name: EventZoomMoveCompletedZoom
Integer.ToolTip: Zoom value of the Zoom Move Completed event.
Integer.Description: Zoom value of the Zoom Move Completed event.

Integer.Name: EventTest
Integer.ToolTip: Unique identifier of the Test event.
Integer.Description: Unique identifier of the Test event. Use this parameter to get notified when the event occurs.

Integer.Name: EventTestTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Timestamp of the test event.
Integer.Description: Timestamp of the test event.

IntReg.Name: DeviceEventChannelCount
IntReg.Description: Indicates the number of event channels supported by the device.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device to its power up state. After reset, the device must be rediscovered.
Command.Description: Resets the device to its power up state. After reset, the device must be rediscovered.

Command.Name: DeviceFactoryReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets all user-programmable non-volatile memory to default. After reset, the device must be rediscovered.
Command.Description: Resets all user-programmable non-volatile memory to default. After reset, the device must be rediscovered.

Command.Name: ActionSchedulerCommit
Command.ToolTip: Schedules the action to be executed time specified by ActionSchedulerTime, with optional repetition in intervals of ActionSchedulerInterval
Command.Description: Schedules the action to be executed time specified by ActionSchedulerTime, with optional repetition in intervals of ActionSchedulerInterval.

Command.Name: TimestampReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the current value of the device timestamp counter
Command.Description: Resets the current value of the device timestamp counter. After executing this command, the timestamp counter restarts automatically.

Command.Name: TimestampLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latches the current timestamp counter into TimestampLatchValue
Command.Description: Latches the current timestamp counter into TimestampLatchValue.

Command.Name: PixelFixClearData
Command.Description: Initializes the camera's hot pixel array with default values.

Command.Name: PixelFixApplyData
Command.Description: Applies the camera's current hot pixel array to the image stream.

Command.Name: PixelFixSaveData
Command.Description: Stores the camera's hot pixel array to persistant memory.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software or Any.

Command.Name: TestEventGenerate
Command.ToolTip: Generates a Test event that can be used for testing event notification.
Command.Description: Generates a Test event that can be used for testing event notification.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Continuous

Enumeration.Name: DeviceType
Enumeration.Description: Returns the device type.

EnumEntry.Name: Transmitter
EnumEntry.Description: Data stream transmitter device.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.Description: Returns the scan type of the sensor of the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Areascan
EnumEntry.Description: 2D sensor

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTLType
Enumeration.Description: Transport Layer type of the device.

EnumEntry.Name: GigEVision
EnumEntry.Description: GigE Vision

Enumeration.Name: DeviceStreamChannelType
Enumeration.Description: Reports the type of the stream channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Transmitter
EnumEntry.Description: Data stream transmitter channel.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceStreamChannelEndianness
Enumeration.Description: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.

EnumEntry.Name: Little
EnumEntry.Description: Stream channel data is little Endian.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimitMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is active. When disabled, lower level TL specific features are expected to control the throughput. When enabled, DeviceLinkThroughputLimit controls the overall throughput.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit feature.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit feature.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit feature.

Enumeration.Name: ActionSchedulerStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates whether there are actions scheduled.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates whether there are actions scheduled.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.

Enumeration.Name: OffsetAutoCenter
Enumeration.ToolTip: Auto-adjust OffsetX and OffsetY to select the center region of the sensor.
Enumeration.Description: Automatically adjust the values of OffsetX and OffsetY to select the center region of the sensor.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixels provided by the device
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixels provided by the device

Enumeration.Name: GainAuto
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic gain control mode.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureAuto
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed.

Enumeration.Name: MultiFrameSetOutputModeFrameCount
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the number of frames in multi frame set output mode.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the number of frames in multi frame set output mode.

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrameSetOutputModeFrameCount_2Frames
EnumEntry.Description: Use a sequence of 2 frames per frame set.

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrameSetOutputModeFrameCount_4Frames
EnumEntry.Description: Use a sequence of 4 frames per frame set.

Enumeration.Name: AutoFunctionsROIPreset
Enumeration.ToolTip: Select a predefined region of interest for auto functions.
Enumeration.Description: Select a predefined region of interest for auto functions.

Enumeration.Name: LUTSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects which LUT to control.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the exposure of one frame.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.

EnumEntry.Name: Action0
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the Action0 command will be used as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Any
EnumEntry.Description: Selects all available trigger sources.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerOverlap
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the type trigger overlap permitted with the previous frame. This defines when a valid trigger will be accepted for a new frame.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.Description: No trigger overlap is permitted.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadOut
EnumEntry.Description: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period.

Enumeration.Name: StrobeEnable
Enumeration.Description: Enable generation of exposure-synchronized output pulses

Enumeration.Name: StrobePolarity
Enumeration.Description: Select level of exposure-synchronized output pulses

Enumeration.Name: StrobeOperation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Configures the mode of specifying the length of exposure-synchronized output pulses
Enumeration.Description: Configures the mode of specifying the length of exposure-synchronized output pulses

EnumEntry.Name: FixedDuration
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Fixed Duration

Enumeration.Name: ChunkSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Chunk to enable or control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Chunk to enable or control.

EnumEntry.Name: Image
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image
EnumEntry.Description: Image

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureTime
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure Time
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure Time

EnumEntry.Name: Gain
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain
EnumEntry.Description: Gain

Enumeration.Name: EventSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the event notification to be enabled.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the event notification to be enabled. The notification can be enabled using the Event Notification parameter.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Event notifications for the Exposure End event can be enabled.
EnumEntry.Description: Event notifications for the Exposure End event can be enabled.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameTriggerMissed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Event notifications for the Frame Trigger Missed event can be enabled.
EnumEntry.Description: Event notifications for the Frame Trigger Missed event can be enabled.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Event notifications for the Line 1 Rising Edge event can be enabled.
EnumEntry.Description: Event notifications for the Line 1 Rising Edge event can be enabled.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Event notifications for the Line 1 Falling Edge event can be enabled.
EnumEntry.Description: Event notifications for the Line 1 Falling Edge event can be enabled.

EnumEntry.Name: FocusMoveCompleted
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Event notifications for the Focus Move Completed event can be enabled.
EnumEntry.Description: Event notifications for the Focus Move Completed event can be enabled.

EnumEntry.Name: ZoomMoveCompleted
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Event notifications for the Zoom Move Completed event can be enabled.
EnumEntry.Description: Event notifications for the Zoom Move Completed event can be enabled.

EnumEntry.Name: Test
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Event notifications for the Test event can be enabled.
EnumEntry.Description: Event notifications for the Test event can be enabled.

Enumeration.Name: EventNotification
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enables event notifications for the currently selected event.
Enumeration.Description: Enables event notifications for the currently selected event. The event can selected using the Event Selector parameter.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Event notifications are disabled.
EnumEntry.Description: Event notifications are disabled.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Event notifications are enabled.
EnumEntry.Description: Event notifications are enabled.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting user set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 1.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 2.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefault
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active by default when the device is reset.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting user set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 1.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 2.

Enumeration.Name: PtpClockAccuracy
Enumeration.Description: Indicates the expected accuracy of the device PTP clock when it is the grandmaster, or in the event it becomes the grandmaster.

Enumeration.Name: PtpStatus
Enumeration.Description: Returns the current state of the PTP clock.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel. This includes any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data. This is the total size of data payload for a data block.

Category.Name: GigEVision
Category.Description: Category that contains the features pertaining to the GigE Vision transport layer of the device.

Enumeration.Name: GevGVSPExtendedIDMode
Enumeration.Description: Enables the extended IDs mode

Float.Name: DeviceLinkHeartbeatTimeout
Float.Description: Controls the current heartbeat timeout of the specific Link.

Enumeration.Name: FileSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the target file in the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the target file in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: UserFile0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: A file for 2048 bytes of user-defined data.
EnumEntry.Description: A file for 2048 bytes of user-defined data storage.

EnumEntry.Name: UserFile1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: A file for 2048 bytes of user-defined data.
EnumEntry.Description: A file for 2048 bytes of user-defined data storage.

EnumEntry.Name: UserFile2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: A file for 2048 bytes of user-defined data.
EnumEntry.Description: A file for 2048 bytes of user-defined data storage.

Enumeration.Name: FileOperationSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the target operation for the selected file in the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the target operation for the selected file in the device. This Operation is executed when the FileOperationExecute feature is called.

EnumEntry.Name: Open
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Opens the file selected by FileSelector in the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Opens the file selected by FileSelector in the device. The access mode in which the file is opened is selected by FileOpenMode.

EnumEntry.Name: Close
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Closes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Closes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Read
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Reads FileAccessLength bytes from the device storage at the file relative offset FileAccessOffset into FileAccessBuffer.
EnumEntry.Description: Reads FileAccessLength bytes from the device storage at the file relative offset FileAccessOffset into FileAccessBuffer.

EnumEntry.Name: Write
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Writes FileAccessLength bytes taken from the FileAccessBuffer into the device storage at the file relative offset FileAccessOffset.
EnumEntry.Description: Writes FileAccessLength bytes taken from the FileAccessBuffer into the device storage at the file relative offset FileAccessOffset.

EnumEntry.Name: Delete
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Deletes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Deletes the file selected by FileSelector in the device. Note that deleting a device file should not remove the associated FileSelector entry to allow future operation on this file.

Command.Name: FileOperationExecute
Command.ToolTip: Executes the operation selected by FileOperationSelector on the selected file.
Command.Description: Executes the operation selected by FileOperationSelector on the selected file.

Enumeration.Name: FileOpenMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the access mode in which a file is opened in the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the access mode in which a file is opened in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadWrite
EnumEntry.ToolTip: This mode selects read and write open mode.
EnumEntry.Description: This mode selects read and write open mode.

Register.Name: FileAccessBuffer
Register.ToolTip: Defines the intermediate access buffer that allows the exchange of data between the device file storage and the application.
Register.Description: Defines the intermediate access buffer that allows the exchange of data between the device file storage and the application.

Integer.Name: FileAccessOffset
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Offset of the mapping between the device file storage and the FileAccessBuffer.
Integer.Description: Controls the Offset of the mapping between the device file storage and the FileAccessBuffer.

Integer.Name: FileAccessLength
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Length of the mapping between the device file storage and the FileAccessBuffer.
Integer.Description: Controls the Length of the mapping between the device file storage and the FileAccessBuffer.

Enumeration.Name: FileOperationStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Represents the file operation execution status.
Enumeration.Description: Represents the file operation execution status.

EnumEntry.Name: Success
EnumEntry.ToolTip: File Operation was successful.
EnumEntry.Description: File Operation was successful.

EnumEntry.Name: Failure
EnumEntry.ToolTip: File Operation failed.
EnumEntry.Description: File Operation failed.

Integer.Name: FileOperationResult
Integer.ToolTip: Represents the file operation result.
Integer.Description: Represents the file operation result. For Read or Write operations, the number of successfully read/written bytes is returned.

Integer.Name: FileSize
Integer.ToolTip: Represents the size of the selected file in bytes.
Integer.Description: Represents the size of the selected file in bytes.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.Description: No trigger overlap is permitted.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadOut
EnumEntry.Description: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
StringReg.Description: Device's serial number. This string is a unique identifier of the device.

StringReg.Name: TimestampLatchString
StringReg.ToolTip: Human-readable interpretation of the latched timestamp
StringReg.Description: Human-readable interpretation of the latched timestamp.

MaskedIntReg.Name: DeviceTLVersionMajor
MaskedIntReg.Description: Major version of the Transport Layer of the device.

MaskedIntReg.Name: DeviceTLVersionMinor
MaskedIntReg.Description: Minor version of the Transport Layer of the device.

IntSwissKnife.Name: ChunkMultiFrameSetId
IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: The id of the frame set in Multi Frame Set Output Mode
IntSwissKnife.Description: Returns the id of the frame set in Multi Frame Set Output Mode.

IntSwissKnife.Name: ChunkMultiFrameSetFrameId
IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: The the frame id in the frame set in Multi Frame Set Output Mode
IntSwissKnife.Description: Returns the frame id in the frame set in Multi Frame Set Output Mode.
IntSwissKnife.DisplayName: Chunk Multi Frame Set Frame Id

Float.Name: DeviceTemperature
Float.Description: Device temperature in degrees Celsius (°C). It is measured at the location selected by DeviceTemperatureSelector.

Float.Name: SensorPixelWidth
Float.Description: Physical size (pitch) in the x direction of a photo sensitive pixel unit.

Float.Name: SensorPixelHeight
Float.Description: Physical size (pitch) in the y direction of a photo sensitive pixel unit.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate at which the frames are captured.

Float.Name: BlackLevel
Float.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value. This represents a DC offset applied to the video signal

Float.Name: Gain
Float.Description: Controls the gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to he video signal.

Float.Name: GainAutoLowerLimit
Float.ToolTip: Lower limit for the GainAuto function
Float.Description: Lower limit for the GainAuto function.

Float.Name: GainAutoUpperLimit
Float.ToolTip: Upper limit for the GainAuto function
Float.Description: Upper limit for the GainAuto function.

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light.

Float.Name: ExposureAutoLowerLimit
Float.ToolTip: Lower limit for the ExposureAuto function
Float.Description: Lower limit for the ExposureAuto function.

Float.Name: ExposureAutoUpperLimit
Float.ToolTip: Upper limit for the ExposureAuto function
Float.Description: Upper limit for the ExposureAuto function.

Float.Name: MultiFrameSetOutputModeExposureTime0
Float.ToolTip: Configures the exposure time for frame 0 of the frame set.
Float.Description: Configures the exposure time for frame 0 of the frame set.

Float.Name: MultiFrameSetOutputModeExposureTime1
Float.ToolTip: Configures the exposure time for frame 1 of the frame set.
Float.Description: Configures the exposure time for frame 1 of the frame set.

Float.Name: MultiFrameSetOutputModeExposureTime2
Float.ToolTip: Configures the exposure time for frame 2 of the frame set.
Float.Description: Configures the exposure time for frame 2 of the frame set.

Float.Name: MultiFrameSetOutputModeExposureTime3
Float.ToolTip: Configures the exposure time for frame 3 of the frame set.
Float.Description: Configures the exposure time for frame 3 of the frame set.

Float.Name: MultiFrameSetOutputModeGain0
Float.ToolTip: Configures the gain for frame 0 of the frame set.
Float.Description: Configures the gain for frame 0 of the frame set.

Float.Name: MultiFrameSetOutputModeGain1
Float.ToolTip: Configures the gain for frame 1 of the frame set.
Float.Description: Configures the gain for frame 1 of the frame set.

Float.Name: MultiFrameSetOutputModeGain2
Float.ToolTip: Configures the gain for frame 2 of the frame set.
Float.Description: Configures the gain for frame 2 of the frame set.

Float.Name: MultiFrameSetOutputModeGain3
Float.ToolTip: Configures the gain for frame 3 of the frame set.
Float.Description: Configures the gain for frame 3 of the frame set.

Float.Name: Gamma
Float.Description: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity. This is typically used to compensate for nonlinearity of the display system (such as CRT).

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.Description: Specifies the delay to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Float.Name: TriggerDebouncer
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the time for which trigger input has to be low in order accept the next trigger signal.
Float.Description: Specifies the time for which trigger input has to be low in order accept the next trigger signal.

Float.Name: TriggerMask
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the time for which trigger pulses are ignored after accepting a trigger signal.
Float.Description: Specifies the time for which trigger pulses are ignored after accepting a trigger signal.

Float.Name: TriggerDenoise
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the time for which trigger input has to be high in order to be accepted as a trigger signal.
Float.Description: Specifies the time for which trigger input has to be high in order to be accepted as a trigger signal.

SwissKnife.Name: ChunkGain
SwissKnife.Description: Returns the gain used to capture the image.

SwissKnife.Name: ChunkExposureTime
SwissKnife.Description: Returns the exposure time used to capture the image.

Boolean.Name: ExposureAutoHighlighReduction
Boolean.ToolTip: Lets the ExposureAuto/GainAuto algorithm try to avoid over-exposures.
Boolean.Description: Lets the ExposureAuto/GainAuto algorithm try to avoid over-exposures.

Boolean.Name: ExposureAutoHighlightReduction
Boolean.ToolTip: Lets the ExposureAuto/GainAuto algorithm try to avoid over-exposures.
Boolean.Description: Lets the ExposureAuto/GainAuto algorithm try to avoid over-exposures.

Boolean.Name: ExposureAutoUpperLimitAuto
Boolean.Description: Automatically sets the upper limit to match the Acquisition Frame Rate.

Boolean.Name: MultiFrameSetOutputModeEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the sensor to output a sequence of 2 or 4 frames with configurable exposure times and gain values.
Boolean.Description: Enables the sensor to output a sequence of 2 or 4 frames with configurable exposure times and gain values.
Boolean.DisplayName: Enable Multi Frame Set Output Mode

Boolean.Name: MultiFrameSetOutputModeCustomGain
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the sensor to use customizable gain values for the different frames of a frame set.
Boolean.Description: Enables the sensor to use customizable gain values for the different frames of a frame set.

Boolean.Name: PixelFixEnable
Boolean.Description: Enables the camera's hot pixel correction.

Boolean.Name: PixelFixDebug
Boolean.Description: Enables the camera's hot pixel correction debug mode (show hot pixels).

Boolean.Name: AutoFunctionsROIEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enable the region of interest for auto functions.
Boolean.Description: Enable the region of interest for auto functions.

Boolean.Name: IMXLowLatencyTriggerMode
Boolean.Description: Enables the low-latency mode for IMX global shutter sensors. This mode reduces the jitter between trigger input and exposure start, but disallows trigger overlap.

Boolean.Name: ChunkModeActive
Boolean.Description: Activates the inclusion of Chunk data in the payload of the image.

Boolean.Name: ChunkEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the inclusion of the selected Chunk data in the payload of the image.
Boolean.Description: Enables the inclusion of the selected Chunk data in the payload of the image.

Register.Name: LUTValueAll
Register.Description: Accesses all the LUT coefficients in a single access without using individual LUTIndex.

Register.Name: ChunkImage
Register.Description: Returns the entire image data included in the payload.
